scripts.list-kv-namespaces: npx wrangler kv key list --binding=KV_CHESS_GAMES_BY_USER --config wrangler.json
scripts.execute-schema-staging: npx wrangler d1 execute staging-d1-games --remote --file=./schema.sql --env staging
scripts.show-all-games-staging: npx wrangler d1 execute staging-d1-games --command 'Select * from Games;' --remote
scripts.show-all-games-prod: npx wrangler d1 execute prod-d1-games --command 'Select * from Games;' --remote
